headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Rejects Appeals of Tobacco Ruling
headline.seo: Supreme Court Rejects Appeals of Tobacco Ruling
headline.main: Supreme Court Rejects Appeals of Tobacco Ruling

docs.lead_paragraph: An industry appeal of a racketeering verdict was rejected, as was a request to force the companies to return billions in profits.
docs.snippet: An industry appeal of a racketeering verdict was rejected, as was a request to force the companies to return billions in profits.
